019package com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations;
020
021import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
022import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.types.BooleanFlag;
023import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
024
025public class HideInfoFlag extends BooleanFlag<HideInfoFlag> {
026
027    public static final HideInfoFlag HIDE_INFO_TRUE = new HideInfoFlag(true);
028    public static final HideInfoFlag HIDE_INFO_FALSE = new HideInfoFlag(false);
029
030    private HideInfoFlag(boolean value) {
031        super(value, TranslatableCaption.of("flags.flag_description_hide_info"));
032    }
033
034    @Override
035    protected HideInfoFlag flagOf(@NonNull Boolean value) {
036        return value ? HIDE_INFO_TRUE : HIDE_INFO_FALSE;
037    }
038
039}
